column4: Any one know how to fix resolution at 1920x1080 with newest nvidia driver, the top tool bar doesnt fit screen properly. Ive tried 9.04 and 8.10
with my nvidia drivers, and my "monitor"(my tv), i had to set the resolution for it to work correctly.
Resolution is already set to 1920x1080, Is there any way to calibrate or something
excuse me..wrong wording, i had to change the dpi to get it to fit on the screen.
